parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>False. There is no CMF number present in the provided post information.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>True. The post explicitly mentions several PSD candidates (Larisa Blanari, Mirela Adomnicăi, George Mândruță, and Cristian Șologon) running in the Suceava parliamentary elections.  It directly refers to them as "Candidați PSD Suceava la alegerile parlamentare". This fulfills Article 36 (7) - a.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>True. The post is a paid advertisement on Facebook, a public platform, and aims to reach a broad audience in Suceava County, as evidenced by the reach estimate (100K - 500K) and location data in the insights. This fulfills the requirement of addressing the public ("publicului larg").</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>True. The clear objective of the post is to encourage voters in Suceava to vote for the mentioned PSD candidates. The question posed ("De ce să voteze sucevenii echipa PSD") and the candidates' responses directly promote their candidacy and aim to influence voting behavior. This fulfills Article 36 (7) - c.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>False. While the post presents itself as a Q&A with candidates, it lacks the objectivity and neutrality expected of journalistic reporting.  The framing of the questions and the exclusive focus on positive aspects of the candidates' platforms strongly suggest a promotional, rather than journalistic, intent. The post does not provide balanced information or diverse perspectives.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>False. The content is not a personal opinion; it's a coordinated effort to promote specific candidates and their party. The responses are carefully crafted to present a positive image and encourage voting for the PSD.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>1995817070930630</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The Facebook post, paid for by "Informatia ta", clearly constitutes electoral propaganda. It directly names and promotes PSD candidates running in the Suceava parliamentary elections. The post's design, content, and targeting all point towards influencing voters to support these candidates. The Q&A format is a thinly veiled attempt to circumvent regulations, as it lacks journalistic objectivity and presents only positive aspects of the candidates. The high reach estimate (100K-500K) and the specified location targeting (Suceava County) further solidify its intention to sway voters.  The post's content directly fulfills the criteria outlined in Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006.  The fact that the post was published after the official end of the electoral campaign period (end_date: 1732953600, which corresponds to November 23rd, 2024, after 6 PM) further strengthens the case for a violation.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate><name>Larisa Blanari</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
  <candidate><name>Mirela Adomnicăi</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
  <candidate><name>George Mândruță</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
  <candidate><name>Cristian Șologon</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>PSD</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
Informatia ta, pentru incalcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea dupa ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024 a unei postari pe Facebook (ID: 1995817070930630), cu un buget de RON 100-199, care promoveaza explicit candidatii PSD Larisa Blanari, Mirela Adomnicăi, George Mândruță și Cristian Șologon la alegerile parlamentare din Suceava, avand ca efect electoral influentarea votului in favoarea acestora. Postarea, sub forma unui interviu, nu respecta standardele jurnalismului obiectiv, prezentand doar aspecte pozitive ale candidatilor si ignorand perspective alternative.  Targeting-ul geografic (judetul Suceava) si estimarea de reach (100K-500K) demonstreaza intentia clara de a influenta electoratul.  Continutul postarii indeplineste criteriile de propaganda electorala conform articolului 36 (7) din LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006, fiind astfel o incalcare flagranta a legii.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
